title: Mystery House of the Cursed Priest
story: After the demise of the Cursed Priest the house has changed hands many times. Recently an undead basilisk has made its lair here. Word is that a legendary wand Men is hidden here.

notes.text: A lavishly decorated door with a keyhole to the west.
A rusty dagger, a chainmail and some gold hidden in a crack of the wall.
A medium chest holds a golden key.
A strange, covered with hieroglyphs object locked in a mechanical safe.
